name: Blackjack Buddy
description:
The objective of the game is to get a hand with a value as close to 21 as possible without going over. As the player, you're competing against the house (the dealer) and spoils go to the person with the best hand. 

Blackjack Buddy has two unique features that can be toggled on/off depending on player preference. Blackjack Buddy keeps track of the running count for the deck in play. The running count keeps track of the house edge, the higher the count the more the edge shifts towards the players favor. In addition, Blackjack Buddy's Gameplay Tips will tell the player what the statistically best decision based off all information available at the time. 

Whether you choose to play with/without these tools is up to you! 

Blackjack Buddy uses a single deck of cards with the following house rules:

1. The dealer must hit on a soft 17.
2. Players can only double down after their initial hand is dealt.
3. Players cannot double down after splitting.
4. Players can only draw one card when splitting Aces.
5. Hands can only be split after the player's initial hand is dealt.
